name: Rise of the Gunters
description:
Ready Player One: Rise of the Gunters is a fast paced, arcade inspired, First Person Shooter built from the ground up for VR. Come experience the Ready Player One world for yourself!
Pick your gear, setup your Gunter and jump into the action with some friends. Compete against Gunters around the world to take out as many Sixers as possible before the time is up. Don't forget to grab some powerups along the way, and watch out for those rocket troopers.
